public int readAt(byte[] buf,
                  long position,
                  int length)
           throws NotEnoughSequenceException,
                  IOException
Reads a section from the files

Parameters:
buf - Buffer to read the data in
position - Offset in the set to start reading (inclusive)
length - Length to read
Returns:
The number of bytes actually read
Throws:
IOException - If any data errors occur
NotEnoughSequenceException - If there is no more sequence before the end of the set
